Jeppe Ugelvig is a critic and curator based in New York. He is the editor of Viscose Journal, the author of Fashion Work: 25 Years of Art in Fashion (2020),
Jeppe Ugelvig (b. 1993) is a curator and cultural critic based in New York and London. His research focuses on aesthetic production under capitalism.
